prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon that has a unique purple hue and spiky features.
Imagine a tiny creature with soft purple skin and large red eyes, perfect for a forest habitat.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a cocoon, embracing the colors purple and pink.
Generate a Pokemon with a round body shape and distinct spikes, ideally suited for grasslands.

Make a Pokemon that evolves into a beautiful butterfly, starting as a small, spiky form.
Give me a creature that thrives in urban areas, showcasing vibrant purple and red colors.
